description: The '''East Clubbers''' were a dance group from [[Poland]], composed of Piotr Kwiatkowski (DJ Silver) and Piotr Wachnicki (DJ Sqren). Since 2005 to 2010 the band was composed of Piotr Kwiatkowski (DJ Silver) and Pawe≈Ç Gawlik (Max Lade) the composer and music producer. The duo also worked with another Polish producer, Janardana. East Clubbers has many international hits, particularly in Europe, such as "Walk Alone", "Beat is Coming" and "Crazy Right Now".
